channel.title: anime on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in anime on Dipankar's blog

item.title: "Ghost in the shell" : The laughing man
item.description: Well due to one of my best friends i have got rather addicted to GITS :) or “The ghost in the shell”, an awesome japanese anime series. There is a concept or rather a case of the laughing man, and the basis for that is a JD Salinger short story of the same name. I take this post to link up to that story, hope you all have a great week ahead.
